title: Kendall Jenner posts cheeky throwback snap of her famous Victoria's Secret Angel Halloween costume
text:
Halloween season is upon us.

And Kendall Jenner took a trip down memory lane to Halloween 2018 on Thursday, when she posted a throwback pic of herself dressed as a Victoria's Secret Angel to Instagram.

'[L]ast year’s halloween [ANGEL EMOJI]' the supermodel captioned the booty-ful snap.

Cheeky: Kendall Jenner took a trip down memory lane to Halloween 2018 on Thursday, when she posted a throwback pic of herself dressed as a Victoria's Secret Angel to Instagram

In the saucy snap, Kendall showed off her pert posterior as she threw a look back over her right shoulder.

Her view was obscured by the massive angel's wings hanging from her shoulders.

Joining her in her costume fun were sisters Kim, Kourtney, Kylie and Khloe.

'[L]ast year’s halloween [ANGEL EMOJI]' the supermodel captioned the booty-ful snap

Meanwhile, Jenner proved why she is so successful in the fashion industry as she donned extravagant tulle gowns for the Giambattista Valli Loves H&M show in Rome on Thursday.

The Vogue coverstar, 23, looked incredible as she slipped into a plunging scarlet ballgown with eccentric frilled shoulderpads which teased her decolletage.

The gown cinched in at her slender waist before flowing into a quirky mullet skirt.

The skirt exhibited her honed legs which were clad in vertiginous heels.

Her raven tresses were styled in a sleek updo while her pretty features were enhanced with a radiant palette of make-up.

Wow: Kendall Jenner proved why she is so successful in the fashion industry as she donned extravagant tulle gowns for the Giambattista Valli Loves H&M show in Rome on Thursday

Princess-inspired: The KUWTK star, 23, slipped into a pastel pink ballerina inspired tulle mini dress, which was adorned with a white bow belt.

Strut: The Vogue coverstar looked incredible as she slipped into a plunging scarlet ballgown with eccentric frilled shoulderpads

Legs for days: The gown cinched in at her slender waist before flowing into a quirky mullet skirt

Radiant: Her raven tresses were styled in a sleek updo while her pretty features were enhanced with a radiant palette of make-up

The KUWTK star then slipped into a pastel pink ballerina inspired tulle mini dress, which was adorned with a white bow belt.

The gown featured a frothy skirt which cut high on the beauty's honed legs, with Kendall adding a splash of colour with red satin ankle boots.

The daughter of Kris and Caitlyn Jenner recently featured in a star-studded ad campaign for the Giambattista Valli collaboration with H&M.

Toned: The gown featured a frothy skirt which cut high on the beauty's honed legs, with Kendall adding a splash of colour with red satin ankle boots

Work it: Kendall looked stunning as she commanded attention on the runway

Glow: Kendall looked angelic as she walked along the runway

She was part of a sensational lineup that included Shameless actor Cameron Monaghan, singer-songwriter H.E.R. and Italian fashion blogger Chiara Ferragni.

'I love the dramatic yet accessible silhouettes; they make me feel powerful and effortless, which is what being fabulous is all about, in my opinion,' Kendall gushed of the collection to Harper's Bazaar.

The globetrotting clotheshorse, who went to Giambattista's native Rome for the ad shoot, said: 'It’s also the personal touches throughout the collection that make me really connect to the pieces. It’s like wearing a little piece of Giamba himself.'

Glossy: The star looked glowing as she made her way down the runway

Showstopping; The star struck a serene pose as she rocked the runway at the show
description: Kendall Jenner took a trip down memory lane to Halloween 2018 on Thursday, when she posted a throwback pic of herself dressed as a Victoria's Secret Angel to Instagram.
